Resurrecting a New York City Drinking Landmark Posted on: Nov. 26, 2015 | Destinations | By: Alicia Kennedy Facebook Tweet LinkedIn Pin Email Every neighborhood in New York City is dying, they say. High-rise condo buildings and a homogenized landscape of national chains and personality-free restaurants have replaced mom-and-pop shops, neighborhood meeting places, and local dives . In the East Village, though, one such dive has gotten a new chance to be its old self. Holiday Cocktail Lounge , located at 75 St. Marks Place, was once, the story goes, the go-to bar for people like Allen Ginsburg, Iggy Pop, The Rolling Stones, and even the revolutionary Leon Trotsky. Its almost 100-year history began in 1919 when it opened as a speakeasy , and ever since, its clientele was a creative mishmash, a reflection of the neighborhood where it‚Äôs located. The 1983 Madonna hit ‚ÄúHoliday‚Äù is said to have been inspired by the place. ‚ÄúIt has been part of the East Village‚Äôs social fabric for generations and a nexus for those who embrace iconoclastic creativity, artistic passion and boundless intellectualism and served as an antidote to everyday life,‚Äù says owner Robert Ehrlich, creator of the snack Pirate‚Äôs Booty, who spent three years renovating the bar. Michael Neff, the bar manager formerly of Ward III and The Rum House, is especially keen on the historical relevance of Holiday. ‚ÄúWith so much of authentic New York disappearing, it was truly a privilege to rescue a bar with almost a century of history,‚Äù he says, noting that during the renovation they found a Prohibition-era tunnel in the bar that takes you across the street. The Long Island Iced Tea at Holiday Cocktail Lounge is made with tea from the nearby Porto Rico Importing Co. and remains true to the bar‚Äôs original lack of pretension. In creating a cocktail program at a place with such a storied history as a dive, Neff decided to take his inspiration from what is available in the neighborhood. This leads to a bespoke style behind the bar; if there‚Äôs a big pile of turmeric being sold down the block, he will figure out a way to work with it. They‚Äôre making a Long Island Iced Tea, but it‚Äôs infused with tea purchased at Porto Rico Importing Co. in the neighborhood. As a veteran of the craft cocktail scene who has seen its evolution, he believes there is a movement now toward simplicity. ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt want to be mixologists anymore. We just want to be bartenders,‚Äù he says. That‚Äôs why he‚Äôs focused on creating a menu that‚Äôs easily executable and ‚Äú100 percent based in having a good time.‚Äù They‚Äôre working at a high level, but doing work that‚Äôs a bit cheeky from the standpoint of where cocktails are right now. Revamping an iconic bar puts a premium on authenticity, and there is nothing authentic to the old East Village about paying $12 for a cocktail. Everything was super cheap at the old Holiday, and though now everything about running a bar is more expensive, the history has to be honored. ‚ÄúI want to be accessible,‚Äù Neff says, which is why you can get a $35 glass of top-shelf whiskey or a $4 beer and shot combo. ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt have to spend all your money when you come in,‚Äù Neff assures. Holiday could have gone full-on kitsch in their reopening, but they‚Äôve made the decision to look toward history and their neighbors for inspiration. It‚Äôs a bar working within a context , without hitting you over the head with it. Capturing the bar‚Äôs philosophy, Neff says of its storied history, ‚ÄúThat New York is gone. How do we do things that can be infused with it?‚Äù The drink menu at Holiday Cocktail Lounge is ‚Äú100 percent based in having a good time.‚Äù Recent Posts The New Orleans Spirits Competition 2025 Privilege Cocktail Lounge | Premium Cocktails in Historic South Beach top of page HOME ABOUT US MENU GALLERY PRIVATE EVENTS CONTACT More... Use tab to navigate through the menu items. HOME ABOUT US MENU GALLERY PRIVATE EVENTS CONTACT More... Use tab to navigate through the menu items. ABOUT Enjoy the Experience Nestled in the heart of Miami's historic South Beach, Privilege Cocktail Lounge is an upscale cocktail bar located in the lobby of the iconic Albion Hotel. Combining a welcoming ambiance with a world-class selection of spirits, we're proud to offer a welcoming experience for Miami-based professionals, visitors to Magic City and socialites alike. Whether you're looking to network, enjoy crafted cocktails or spend quality time with friends, Privilege Cocktail Lounge is the premier destination in South Beach. View Our Menu Join the club GET UPDATES ON SPECIAL EVENTS, LIMITED EDITION COCKTAILS & PROMOTIONS Subscribe Now Thanks for submitting! FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM CONTACT VISIT US 1650 James Avenue Miami Beach, FL 33139 (Located in the Albion Hotel) Phone: (305) 913-1025 ‚Äã Open 2pm to 1am Daily PRIVATE EVENTS For private event inquiries, please contact: info@privilegemia.com PRESS For any media request, please contact: antone@privilegemia.com bottom of page

PRIVATE EVENTS | Privilege Lounge top of page HOME ABOUT US MENU GALLERY PRIVATE EVENTS CONTACT More... Use tab to navigate through the menu items. HOST YOUR EVENT AT PRIVILEGE COCKTAIL LOUNGE Privilege Cocktail Lounge is the perfect location for your next event! With our prime location in the heart of South Beach, Miami, Privilege Cocktail Lounge is an accessible, upscale cocktail lounge nestled in the lobby of the iconic Albion Hotel. ‚Äã Furnished with velvet and leather, Privilege Cocktail Lounge exudes an upscale and chic ambiance, making it an ideal venue for intimate celebrations, corporate events, mixers and more.¬† Our bar is equipped with a projector and 3 TVs, perfect for screening presentations, sports games, and other media. W e love curating bespoke event packages to fit our clients' needs. From bespoke cocktails to customizing the lighting at our bar to suit your theme, we're here to help make your event unforgettable. ‚Äã Ready to plan your event? Please fill out the event form by clicking the link below or email info@privilegemia.com with details on how we can make your private event a success . You'll recieve a response within 48 hours. EVENT FORM bottom of page

Privilege Team Definition | Law Insider Schedule a Demo Sign In Sign Up Standard Templates Public Contracts Resources About Pricing Home Dictionary Privilege Team Privilege Team definition Privilege Team means a team comprised of one or more DoD attorneys and one or more intelligence or law enforcement personnel who have not taken part in, and, in the future , will not take part in, any domestic or foreign court, military commission, or combatant status tribunal proceedings involving the detainee. If required , the Privilege Team may include interpreters/translators, provided that such personnel meet these same criteria. View Source Based on 5 documents 5 Draft with AI Split View AI-Powered Contracts Draft, Review & Redline at the Speed of AI Get Started Schedule a Demo Related to Privilege Team Project Steering Committee means the committee referred to in Section I.A.1 of Schedule 2 to this Agreement. Project Team means Owner, Contractor, A/E and consultants, any separate Contractors employed by Owner, and others employed for the purpose of programming, design, and construction of the Project. The members of the Project Team will be designated in writing by Owner and may be modified from time to time in writing by Owner. Joint Steering Committee or ‚ÄúJSC‚Äù has the meaning set forth in Section 3.1. Project Managers means the individuals identified in Section 12 of this Agreement who are authorized by TriMet and Subrecipient respectively to send and receive communications regarding this Agreement. IEP team means a group of individuals described in Wis. Stat. ¬ß 115.78 that is responsible for evaluating the child to determine the child‚Äôs eligibility or continued eligibility for special education and related services and the educational needs of the child; developing, reviewing, or revising an IEP for the child; and determining the special education placement for the child. We have received your request and will be in touch within 24 hours. fleet-return-page About Qatar Executive & Qatar Airways Privilege Club You can now collect & spend Avios with Qatar Executive. Book direct and unlock rewards as you fly in ultimate luxury, with every journey tailored to you. - Collect 4 Avios for every USD 1 spent. - Spend Avios on bookings. - Pool your Avios with friends and family. You can find further details about how to collect and spend Avios with us by checking the FAQs below. If you'd like to make a booking, please call +974 4022 1700 or select 'start your booking' to begin planning your trip. Avios Frequently Asked Questions How do I become a member of Privilege Club? You can enroll in Privilege Club online by visiting qatarairways.com. Please click here to become a member. What are the benefits of joining Privilege Club? As a member of Privilege Club, you get access to exclusive rewards and benefits that can elevate your experience with Qatar Airways. Collect Qpoints to elevate your tier; the higher your tier, the greater the benefits such as meet and greet services, extra baggage, lounge access worldwide and more. Collect and spend Avios, Qatar Airways‚Äô preferred currency, to access rewards such as Qatar Airways flights, Upgrades, Qatar Duty Free and more. To learn more about Privilege Club member benefits, click here . How many Avios can I collect when flying with Qatar Executive? If you book and pay directly with Qatar Executive, you are eligible to earn four (4) Avios per one (1) US Dollar of the Charter Price. How can I earn Avios when flying with Qatar Executive? You must provide your Privilege Club Membership Number to the Qatar Executive sales team at the time of booking your Qatar Executive flight before the Aircraft Charter Agreement is issued. How can I spend Avios when booking with Qatar Executive? You can choose to pay Avios in part or full when booking a charter flight. Please get in touch with the Qatar Executive team directly for a formal quotation by emailing request@qatarexec.com.qa confirming your Privilege Club membership number, requested date of flight, destination and passenger details. How many Avios do I need to book a flight with Qatar Executive? Our pricing is dynamic and is based on aircraft type, routes, and flying hours amongst other details. Every quotation is tailored to our passengers and their unique requirements. Please get in touch with the Qatar Executive team directly for a formal quotation by emailing request@qatarexec.com.qa confirming your Privilege Club membership number, requested date of flight, destination and passenger details. How can I pool my Avios with friends and family to use for Qatar Executive charter flight? Upon requesting a quotation with the Qatar Executive team, please mention that the Avios to be paid will be pooled with friends and family. The relevant information will be captured via a Redemption Form along with consent of each member before a flight charter agreement is issued. How can I obtain a Privilege Club tier upgrade for myself or my family, once I have booked with Qatar Executive? If you book and pay for a charter flight, you will receive an allocation of one (1) Platinum Tier and three (3) Gold Tier memberships which can be gifted to any individuals nominated by you (the Charterer). The information of the nominees who will receive the gifted Tiers must be provided to the Qatar Executive sales team, within seven (7) days of the Effective Date of the Aircraft Charter Agreement. A Tier Gift Nomination Form will be provided to capture the relevant information. Tiers will be updated within seven (7) working days after the request is received by Qatar Airways Privilege Club. Can I claim missing Avios from bookings I have made in the past direct with Qatar Executive? Avios can be credited for any new Qatar Executive charters booked and paid for on/after 10 th October 2024. Please ensure that you provide your Privilege Club Membership Number to the Qatar Executive sales team at the time of booking your Qatar Executive charter flight and in any event, before your charter agreement is issued. Avios will be credited within seven (7) working days after journey completion (completion of the full trip).
